mainWorkshop.title: Multi-Agent Mastery
mainWorkshop.subtitle: Orchestration for the future
mainWorkshop.description: Dive deep into the world of autonomous agents and discover how to orchestrate multiple AI agents to solve complex problems. Learn the latest techniques in agent-based systems, prompt engineering, and real-world applications.

onlineWorkshops.title: AI SDK Advanced
onlineWorkshops.description: Master the Vercel AI SDK and build production-ready AI applications with advanced patterns and best practices.

onlineWorkshops.title: LangChain Integration
onlineWorkshops.description: Learn to build sophisticated AI applications using LangChain, from simple chains to complex reasoning systems.
